EmailTemplate.name: EMC Federation Email Ticket Template
EmailTemplate.subject: Pivotal Customer Support - EMC Federation Support
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for contacting Pivotal Support - EMC Federation Support.
To start with, please provide us the following details: 1. End Company Name: 2. End Customer Name: 3. End Customer contact information, email & phone #: 4. Pivotal Customer Number: 5. Product: 6. Product version: 7. Problem description: 8. Severity: (ex. S1-S4) 9. Latest action plan: (ex. Last update to customer) 10. Federation Support request #: 11. Last Federation Customer Engineer contact: Name, email & phone #:
Our agents will review your case {!Case.CaseNumber} and get back to you as soon as possible. Note that during weekends and holidays, we will respond on the next business day.
If you require immediate assistance with a mission critical system, please call +1-877-477-2269 or one of Pivotal's local toll-free support numbers. See https://pivotal.io/support/contact
Kind regards, Pivotal Support
